trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that configures a client credential.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，配置客户端凭据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClientCredentialsElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClientCredentialsElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容应用到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: A configuration element to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用一个配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this behavior element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此行为元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of this behavior element.
trans-unit.target: 此行为元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用的带客户端证书时使用的客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: This element also specifies client certificate validation settings.
trans-unit.target: 此元素还指定客户端证书验证设置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509InitiatorCertificateClientElement"></xref> that specifies the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509InitiatorCertificateClientElement"> </xref> ，它指定当客户端证书时可用的带使用的客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个基于此配置元素的设置的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: A custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于此配置元素的设置的自定义行为。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration element that configures the current HTTP digest credential.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置当前 HTTP 摘要式凭据的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpDigestClientElement"></xref> that configures the current HTTP digest credential.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpDigestClientElement"> </xref>配置当前 HTTP 摘要式凭据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration element that configures the current issued token instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置当前已颁发令牌实例的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenClientElement"></xref> that configures the current issued token.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenClientElement"> </xref>配置的当前颁发的令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configuration element that configures the current peer credential.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置当前对等凭据配置元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement"></xref> that configures the current peer credential.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement"> </xref>配置当前对等凭据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.
trans-unit.target: 获取由客户端启动的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateClientElement"></xref> that specifies an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateClientElement"> </xref> ，它指定由客户端启动的 X.509 证书。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the credential supports interactive negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定凭据是否支持交互式协商。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the credential supports interactive negotiation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果凭据支持交换式协商;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此配置元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the type of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含此配置元素的类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the client credentials uses identity configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否客户端凭据使用标识配置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the client credentials uses identity configuration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果客户端凭据使用标识配置;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the settings for Windows credential validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Windows 凭据验证的设置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WindowsClientElement"></xref> that specifies the settings for Windows credential validation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WindowsClientElement"> </xref> ，指定 Windows 凭据验证的设置。
